post.body: Work? Merry Christmas to you too. :)
LMAO. I just got a present from Barak Obama.
Shoveled snow again this morning, probably another three inches. Now off to in laws in Chippewa. Wish us luck with the roads...
Dumbass husband can't find two gift cards from this afternoon. Nice.
Not sure if I said this already, but Happy Christmas Twitter!
On our way back home. What a busy day!
At my grandmas helping. Bro in law boasting about snow.
Why is it that all the men I ride with think posted speed limits are optional?
Off to see my parents.
Merry Christmas! I hope Santa was extra good to you. :)
A bottle of wine really isn't that much.
Santa wrapping.... *sigh*
I love you all!
Tis the season to be drinking...... I love you all!
Kid is making me wear a Santa hat in public.
Watching them trim the tree on DOOL always makes me cry.
This dog needs some discipline.
Going outside to shovel.
Tracking Santa on NORAD.
Shopping carts are not made for snow.
